price: 33. Ii soo celiya, markaasuu wuxuu billaabay inuu ka masaxo addimmada iyo luquma(hooda)9.
arabic: رُدُّوهَا عَلَيَّۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسۡحَۢا بِٱلسُّوقِ وَٱلۡأَعۡنَاقِ
footnotes: 9. Mufasiriinta qaarkood waxay ku fasireen inuu u gowracay Alle darti u dhowaansho Xaggiisa.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ruddūhā ʿalayya faṭafiqa masḥan bil-sūqi wal-aʿnāqi
